account_center_settings_text: You can update your phone number, email address and password registered in your Traderlands account.
account_center_security_text: View or update your account security settings.
account_center_notification_text: You can set and update your communication preferences for application and telegram notifications.
account_center_connections_text: View, update or recheck your exchange connections
account_center_reference_text: View your referral codes or create a new one!
account_center_settings_contact_text: You can view and update your account information here.
account_center_settings_secure_text: You can update your account password here
account_center_settings_update_email_otp: Please verify your account by entering the code that will be sent to your email
account_center_settings_update_phone_otp: Please verify your account by entering the code that will be sent to your phone
account_center_settings_update_protectio: Please complete the verification steps for the security of your account.
You have successfully added your info to your Traderlands account.
account_center_settings_change_password_: To change your Traderlands account password, please enter your current account password and set your new password here..
Your Traderlands account password has been successfully changed. You can now login to Traderlands using your new password you have set.
To change your Traderlands account password, please enter your current account password and set your new password here.
account_center_security_at_least_one_act: At least one security option must be active
account_center_security_2fa_main_text: You can enable 2FA verification to increase your account security
account_center_security_email_main_text: You can enable email security verification to receive email verification codes
account_center_security_sms_main_text: You can enable sms security verification to receive sms verification codes
account_center_security_2fa_page_main_te: The steps you need to complete in order to complete your 2FA connection are as follows
account_center_security_2fa_page_app_tex: In order to activate the 2FA security verification, you need to download the Authenticator app to your device.
account_center_security_2fa_success_text: You have activated 2FA verification. If you lose your 2FA connection, you may not be able to login to the Traderlands application. Please do not forget to keep the secret key.
account_center_security_2fa_page_install: To begin the Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) activation process, please enter the setup key in the Authenticator app or scan the QR code on the screen.
account_center_security_email_active_tex: You can add the following information and add your activate e-mail security.
account_center_security_email_deactive_t: You can add the following information and add your deactivate e-mail security.
account_center_security_sms_active_text: You can add the following information and add your activate sms security.
account_center_security_sms_deactive_tex: You can add the following information and add your deactivate sms security.
account_center_security_2fa_active_text: You can add the following information and add your activate 2FA security.
account_center_security_2fa_deactive_tex: You can add the following information and add your deactivate 2FA security.
account_center_security_kyc_main_text: You can verify your id in order to withdraw assets from Traderlands wallet or to become an creator.
account_center_security_kyc_active_text: You can add the following information and add your activate KYC security.
account_center_security_kyc_deactive_tex: You can add the following information and add your deactivate KYC security.
account_center_security_kyc_page_text: Before you can create a designer account on the Traderlands Marketplace or withdraw your dynamic credits from your Traderlands wallet, you need to complete the identification verification steps.
account_center_connections_exchange_card: You need to enable your connection in order to use strategies on exchange
Take a few minutes to complete your API settings so Traderlands can communicate with your exchange account!
You need to adjust connection restrictions on exchange in order to use strategies work on Spot markets,
You need to adjust connection restrictions on exchange in order to use strategies work on Futures markets,
You need to adjust connection restrictions on exchange in order to use strategies work on Futures and Spot markets,

account_center_connections_add_connectio: By connecting your account, you can view portfolios and perform automated trading.
account_center_connections_operations_ma: You can control your exchange connection here.
account_center_connections_operations_up: You can change the connection name or API information
account_center_connections_operations_ch: You can have your changes to be synched on Traderlands If you changed the API authorizations on your exchange account
account_center_connections_operations_di: If you do not want to be traded with your connection, you can deactivate it
account_center_connections_operations_en: You can re-enable your deactivated exchange connection
account_center_connections_operations_de: You can delete the connection if you want to remove the API information from Traderlands,
account_center_connections_delete_flow_m: Before removing your API information, we recommend that you read the information below and check your open positions. You can make a new connection again by accessing the Select Exchange section at any time.
Your connection has been successfully removed. You can make a new connection again by accessing the Select Exchange section at any time.
account_center_connections_delete_flow_w: If you delete your exchange connection, the control of the open positions created by your robots working on this exchange and the real-time portfolio monitoring services will be stopped in a way that cannot be edited again. Please note that in this case, the management of your positions on the exchange will not be continued by Traderlands. Please check your open positions and decide to Delete Exchange Connection.
account_center_connections_update_flow_s: You can edit your exchange link information, change the link name or connected API information
account_center_connections_update_flow_m: Your API information has been successfully saved. You can use the buttons below to update your API settings or return to the homepage.
account_center_connections_add_flow_sub_: You need to enter the API information you created on your exchange account into this screen. You can give a name to the account you linked with Traderlands.
account_center_connections_step_0_add_fl: In order to allow Traderlands to communicate with the exchange you have chosen, you must enter your API information. You can complete this process in a few minutes!
account_center_connections_add_flow_moda: Your API information has been successfully registered. You can use the buttons below to update your API settings or return to the homepage.
account_center_connections_check_flow_mo: The restrictions for the exchange connections previously saved on your Traderlands account have been updated.
account_center_connections_disable_flow_: Your API connection has been successfully disabled. You can run it again from the settings section at any time.
account_center_connections_enable_flow_m: Your API connection has been successfully activated.
account_center_connections_add_flow_info: You can follow the steps for creating an API Key on your exchange account:
It will be enough to create the API once.
Enable Spot and Margin Trading option must be active
account_center_connections_otp_text: In order to complete this action, you need to enter the verification codes that sent to your connected devices
account_center_notifications_app_text: Send notification to my browser or mobile apps
account_center_notifications_positions_p: You can choose the notifications you want to receive about your positions.
account_center_notifications_pages_text_: You can decide on the topics that you want to receive notifications for the channel you choose.
account_center_notifications_positions_p: Please choose a language to get notification in that language.
account_center_notifications_customize_p: You can decide on the topics that you want to gather notifications for the channel you choose
account_center_notifications_telegram_in: You can proceed by pressing the Generate Verification Code button to connect Telegram notifications.
account_center_notifications_telegram_au: In order to receive Traderlands notifications from the Telegram bot, please connect your account by sending a Message with verification code to
Click the Show Verification Code button below, and share the code with the bot on Telegram.
Share the verification code below with the Traderlands Telegram bot to complete your Telegram notifications connection

Get referral rewards on the credits paid for transactions in their Traderlands account
